    Generate permuted block treatment assignments

    car_pb.Rd

    Generate permuted block treatment assignments

    car_pb(z, trt_label, trt_alc, blocksize = 4L)

    Arguments

    z

    The strata design matrix, as a data frame with factor variables

    trt_label

    Treatment label

    trt_alc

    Treatment allocation vector

    blocksize

    Permuted block blocksize

    Examples

    # Create strata variables
library(fastDummies)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

x <- runif(100)
z <- cut(x, breaks=c(0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1.0))
z <- dummy_cols(z) %>%
     mutate(across(where(is.numeric), as.factor))

car_pb(z[, 2:5], c(0, 1, 2), trt_alc=c(1/4, 1/2, 1/4), blocksize=4L)
#>   [1] 0 2 0 1 1 1 2 2 0 1 1 1 1 1 2 2 0 0 0 2 1 1 1 2 0 0 1 1 2 0 1 1 1 1 2 2 1
#>  [38] 1 0 1 2 2 1 0 1 1 1 2 2 0 1 0 1 2 0 1 2 1 1 0 1 0 1 1 0 1 2 0 0 2 1 1 2 1
#>  [75] 2 1 1 0 1 1 1 2 2 1 0 1 1 0 2 1 1 1 0 2 0 2 1 1 1 0
